greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Exponent of 3 (value of i) in n-th number of form 3^i*5^j.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: s = {}; m = 12; Do[n = 5^k; While[n <= 5^m, AppendTo[s, n]; n *= 3], {k, 0, m}]; IntegerExponent[#, 3] & /@ Union[s] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Feb 06 2020 *)
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_
